website_summaries.verdict: With more features and a better movie performance rating, the Samsung PX2370 improves--in most areas--on one of the best monitors we've reviewed.
pros: The Samsung PX2370 performs better than the XL2370
it has additional and useful onscreen display options
cons: The Samsung PX2370 lacks ergonomic features, has a dimmer maximum brightness level than the XL2370, and has a less intuitive onscreen display

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there are three stars. I love this monitor. I've had it for over a year. Best for me is the clarity of the text. I don't do much imaging or gaming; just basic business stuff. I've tried others and this one is the most clear for text...for me. I hope this is helpful
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Media Display
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Samsung PX2370 as a secondary external monitor for my laptop, mainly for graphics use. The colors on this screen are ridiculous! While the factory preset for the monitor is way too bright, with a little adjusting this monitor is one of the best looking monitors I have seen. Unfortunately the monitor is NOT wall-mount compatable, although the screens slim design makes up for that. This is a highly recommended buy! PRO's --------- Amazing contrast and refresh rate Very attractive design Lots of ways to connect devices CON's -------- Wobbly monitor stand NO wall-mount holes
customer_reviews.author: L.Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor through J & R via Amazon, because a less expensive 24" Asus was out of stock everywhere, and the Samsung's reviews were very good. I'm not sorry I paid more for this one. Sharp text, good enough color - I haven't bothered to calibrate it. The image is great, I especially like the matte screen. I don't have to deal with the glare from a glossy screen. I'm very happy with it. The controls are not immediately user friendly, but once you get used to them, they seem logical.
customer_reviews.author: Max Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great decision!
customer_reviews.text: After literally weeks of research I decided to get this monitor. It was a great decision! Right now I have a 2010 Mac Mini, Xbox 360, and PS3 connected via HDMI to an HDMI switch which has one HDMI cable running into the port on the PX2370, Logitech external speakers plugged into the audio out and everything works FLAWLESSLY! Minor adjusting is needed to get the best picture possible but that's with ANY monitor/TV so really that should go without saying. This LED monitor is sleek, efficient, bright, beautiful, an all-around excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, bright, easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for work (standard productivity apps, I'm not a gamer sensitive to pixel response and not a graphic designer concerned with color accuracy, so I can't comment on those aspects). The monitor does have a tilt function, which wasn't immediately clear to me from the description. The picture is very sharp using my laptop and the included VGA to DVI cable. The connection between the neck of the monitor and the base seemed slightly unstable at first, but after reseating and tightening it a few times I think it will work out fine. All in all highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M Muller

customer_reviews.title: Clear and bright
customer_reviews.text: I received this monitor in a relatively timely manner considering the free shipping.In good condition. The monitor was easy to deal with out of the box. I am using it as a second monitor. Great resolution. Clear picture and text display. Bright-much brighter than my 23" apple cinema display (which I love and is my main monitor). I find myself trying to lessen the brightness as much as possible to have it match my apple display better. My only complaints: navigating through the menu/settings could be more intuitive, the stand is wobbly and I cant seem to get it to sit evenly-the monitor appears to tilt slightly on the left. Nothing I cant live with. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF A.

customer_reviews.title: best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Figured i would do a quick review for this since it doesn't have too many yet. There are a lot of options for monitors but this fit my budget and had the LED back-light. The blacks are dark and the viewing angles are good. I don't really have any complaints about the picture quality, it is truly magnificent. I do wish it had more output capability and a forward tilt feature. You will get a cleaning cloth in the box, use "distilled" water with it and it will dry without streaks and will be clean. I think this is a great monitor for the price and will probably be buying a second for a dual display.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second PX2370 I've purchased. This one was to function as both a monitor and tv. Hooked up to the cable box via hdmi, pc via dvi and works perfectly. Running sound from the audio line out to the pc there was some noticeable buzz and the only workaround was to use optical out, which you'll need a dedicated sound card for but can find for $50. Over all great picture, easy to use, no headaches. Would love to get a few more to run a multi-monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: Camalus

customer_reviews.title: Great looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm lazy and don't like to fuss with a million different settings but I gave it a go with this monitor and found it to be pretty straight forward. I think the colors are great, video looks great, the monitor itself is very nice looking and the stand is pretty cool as well. Would have been nice for some tilt/height/swivel action but not a biggie. I've only had the monitor for a few hours now so I will add to the review later on.
customer_reviews.author: r3vi3ws4u

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor, good value
customer_reviews.text: Been using it about 3 weeks. Great picture for my Photoshop work (I shoot and print fine art photos.) I shopped around and at the time this seemed to be the best value in a quality Photoshop-worthy monitor. Screen size makes multiple open windows easy. Easy picture controls. Lightweight and small footprint but plenty stable in a regular desktop environment. I'm not a gamer so I can't comment on any lag issues.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Tallahassee

customer_reviews.title: A Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. Full HD capable. Very bright, good contrast. Using for primary monitor and video editing with Premiere CS5--wanted to use for reliable color grading. Takes a little testing to set gamma etc., but thereafter pretty consistent. The only con I can see is the narrow vertical view angle. For consistent results you have to always be at the same angle. Maybe not the best available, but no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality monitor. My GTX 570 absolutely shines on the screen. It does have a strange bright spot on one part of the screen, but only noticeable when the screen is almost all black and viewed significantly off-axis. Hasn't bothered me enough to return it. Still a shame though. The software seems unnecessary, it doesn't do anything. The stand is very stable, not sure how someone could shake the monitor as they type unless they mount the monitor onto their keyboard. It feels like the perfect, and massive, size for desktop use. Definitely gives you the sleek look and performance that you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung LED monitor
customer_reviews.text: An excellent monitor. I find the on-screen text easy to read and quite clear. The stand/support is not stiff enough. Samsung has overdone the emphasis on thinness. Windows 7 recognized it and the tuning to my tastes was easy. I am not sure why it merits a premium price. Recommended, however, especially for the energy savings.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first LED monitor and I have to say that it is absolutely Amazing. The colors and video quality are great. It is very slim and even comes with two cables. One VGA to DV and One DV to DV cable so there is no need to buy cables. Do not hesitate, get this one! I got it in my front door the next day after I order it.
customer_reviews.author: jkalonso

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty monitor
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up as soon as the UPS guy left and I can say it made a great first impression. It's about and inch bigger than my previous monitor standing next to it, but it's color profile and refresh rate are noticeably better on all the tests. Only complaint would be that the stand is wobbly, and the monitor is slightly jostling as I type this.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Overall display quality is excellent and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with a way to mount it to a wall. Overall display quality is excellent and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mychael P.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Santa!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the monitor. The picture is great and it works well with both my laptop and ps3. In my estimation, the only things that could improve the package would be more connectivity options and VESA mounting capability. This monitor is a bargain... or so thinks Santa, ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: Daneel Olivaw

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than you think....
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the Samsung 23 in monitor, although it's larger than I thought. It is consistent with the reviews I read when deciding to purchase this. This picture is great and works fine for an office monitor for a laptop. I have not done any gaming, so I have no perspective there. For $250 I feel I got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor.....
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is great, and ultra this profile makes even the lamest desk appear sheik. The only con is no built in speaker, although a passive optical connector can be utilized for sound.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: A pleasure to view, both for its spacious screen and its vibrant colors. The fact that it's got so small a footprint is a plus. I do wish that the stand were adjustable, but nothing's perfect, right? This comes very, very close.
customer_reviews.author: Village Idiot Savant

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the negative first; This screen doesn't have any height adjustments, and the base is slightly wobbly. The good part, it's LED, looks great, doesn't get my eyes tired and it's really thin. The price is just right as well. Almost perfect, hence the four. Bought two so far ;)
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I've started working more from home and wanted something to plug my work laptop into. Dell came out with an ultra slim LED, which Cnet compared to the PX2370. I opted for a refurbished PX2370. I'm really happy with it. It's lightweight, so it's easy to stow in the closet (I live in a loft and don't have an office room), but nice enough industrial design to leave out. It lacks the ergonomics and 90 degree rotational plane of the pro Dells at the office, but I spent less than 2 bills. If I'm not buying Apple, then Samsung is my second choice.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Be Aware
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this monitor. In fact--I purchased a second one. It wasn't until then that I realized that this monitor is not "VESA" compliant. This does not matter to most. I just wanted to mount above my test bench from the bottom of a shelf. No biggy I'll figure something out...
customer_reviews.author: Dump

customer_reviews.title: The brightness might be getting a little bit dimmer but contrast and color still look great.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor in 2010 and it's still running perfectly. The brightness might be getting a little bit dimmer but contrast and color still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Maury Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: It has a very attractive, contemporary design, and doesn't take up too much space. The base does attract dust and shows it, but that's a petty complaint. The picture quality is among the best I've seen with bright, well saturated colors and deep, crisp blacks. Text is clear. Video playback is smooth. I use this as an external monitor for my HP Envy notebook, and like the combination more than my Apple iMac. All this in a well-priced package! I would buy it again and recommend it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is simply amazing, not a single complaint, all that stuff you read about them wobbling is BS. I have never seen a better picture on any monitor period. BUY THIS AND ENJOY!!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Monitor - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent look. The overall screen appearence is outstanding. The touch sensitive on-off switch is extremely cool. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product so far. it was delivered 2 days earlier than expected! so I'm impressed with that. It is exactly as you expect. Lack of ergonomic adjustments is annoying but in general the picture quality, ports, compatibility, etc. is great. I use it with my macbook pro. I just with it had a speaker... I will update if there's any problem. So far 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: nimooo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful monitor
customer_reviews.text: They don't make this product anymore and it's a shame. This item shipped well, was priced great, and it performs like new. Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: smokydogs

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great price
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out very well. It looks great and was in wonderful shape. Just wish it had an hdmi connection.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: The LED screen provides awesome colors and looks great hooked up via the dvi cable. I do agree the stand provided needs to be updated, because with the smallest knock the screen will shake like crazy. Overall definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The best 23" monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is the best! Crystal clear! Great colors! At first your eyes will hurt cause they need to adjust and what not but when you get used to it it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: ekses

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wide Screen Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This product is flawless. Period. I've seen many LED monitors and this monitor shows the most crisp and clear images. I used to use LG LED monitor and when I viewed 720p files, it was not as crisp as I anticipated. This Samsung product is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor, one of the best I've used. I love it so much I bought 1 (or 2 if the computer supported it) for every device in my house.
customer_reviews.author: PCJ

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: So good I bought a second one. We use very high-end monitors at work for video editing. This is a very solid choice. It really has performed nicely and has a great look to it. Samsung killed it on this one. For the price, I think its hard to argue.
customer_reviews.author: Kern_16

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in excellent condition. Great price and great quality! The picture is amazing when combined with my new Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 ti! It is the envy of our office. It is amazingly slim!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hampton

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG PX2370 hands down...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best LED monitor ever! I've been always a Samsung fan on tv's/monitors. The image quality on this baby is phenomenal and I would recommend this to you!!! HANDS DOWN... SAMSUNG FTW
customer_reviews.author: Wallace K. H. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor a few weeks ago and love it. Easy to set up, very cleans lines and light weight. My only issue is with my computer. I can't get the best video quality because my computer has an old video card. Some reviewers said that the base was not stable. I have had NO issue with the base. I plan to upgrade my computer very soon so that I can watch HD movies at my desk with the best video quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Good But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great TV. It is simple and sleek. The picture is not great, but for the price (always buy on sale) this is one good TV.
customer_reviews.author: Evaluator

customer_reviews.title: Great, even for a designer.
customer_reviews.text: really great monitor for the price. seriously. takes a bit of balancing the color for a mac, but now i use everyday (and i'm a designer).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome. Just setup the display to use 1920x1080 with 60Hz (not 75 Hz) and it's a joy to look at all day.
customer_reviews.author: CompuMan

customer_reviews.title: I only got 4 years out of this monitor. ...
customer_reviews.text: I only got 4 years out of this monitor. I spent close to 300 bucks for it. I won't be buying another anything from samsung. nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: 1jazzlover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Sharpness and brighten clear view ~~ everything perfect ! However , 60Hz is not good ..I wish it would be 120Hz ^ ^ a little bit dragged picture made my eyes be tired
customer_reviews.author: serena

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second monitor to go with the PX2370 I already own. Arrived in like-new condition. This is a great monitor, especially under $200.
customer_reviews.author: jonatello

customer_reviews.title: Warning Mac users--does not work properly for Macs!
customer_reviews.text: Just connected this to my new MacBook Pro via DVI. Immediately noticed that the text looks really crummy, particularly in the Finder. Pixelated or not anti-aliasing properly or something. Display was set correctly to 1920x1080 at 60 Hertz. Phoned Samsung support and was told that although the monitor is "Mac compatible," there are "sometimes problems with the way text looks and sometimes the whole picture looks bad. We see that a lot with Macs." ?! They also said that no Samsung monitors have Mac drivers. Back to Amazon it goes. Forewarned. EDIT: just received a Viewsonic 2436. Much, much better quality than the Samsung. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor out there! No doubt. Picture quality is top notch. Design is sleek and nice. Everything is just perfect. Top of the line monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Mengzhe

customer_reviews.title: Love my monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have had my PX2370 for 1 week and I love it. The plug-in that Samsung sent me would not work except with an adapator, so I connected my computer and monitor with a HDMI cable and got a true 1080. the display is so clear. I would recommend this monitor to all. Amazon was so nice when talking to them on the phone and got my monitor in a timley manner. I give the PX2370 a Amoxon a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: hotdog1942

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: The only disadvantage listed to this monitor in other online reviews I saw was the price, and it wasn't too bad by the time I got to it on Amazon. The monitor is thin, sleek, adjustable, and when matched with digital output from a computer the display is great. Setup was easy enough that I could plug in and get right back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Fishell

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews and this one definitely lived up to expectations and exceeded them! Been really happy with it especially at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Leo

customer_reviews.title: Quite Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say the reviews I looked up on this thing are right. A very nice screen indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best monitor I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best monitor I ever owned, the color and brightness is awesome. This is definitely not a cheap monitor where the color is yellowish.
customer_reviews.author: saruberoz

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect. Soft LED, brighter and more color than my mac pro or pc. Light weight and slim. Because of light weight it shakes a lot on my desk every time when I try to enter something on my keyboard;kind of annoying. Other than that overall it is great monitor not worse it.
customer_reviews.author: WhatYoonSays

customer_reviews.title: Samsung PX2370 23-Inch Widescreen LCD Monitor with LED Backlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Monitor, but unfortunately it is no longer in production and cannot be purchased new. I would look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: T Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I have had
customer_reviews.text: I def recommend this to anyone. At the time you couldn't beat it and its still great today. Have had for like 3 years I think and its still perfect. great buy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: All right so far
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this screen a week ago, and so far it works well.Good color, though I don't know if the color accuracy is as outstanding as they advertised. One tiny problem is with the power plugs. It's slightly tilted at the end point which makes it difficult to fit into some sockets. But once it is in, the screen works.So I guess I won't return it.However, another thing really bothers me is that it came without any instructional handbook nor warranty book. Because it's refurbished? I really don't think so. I registered the product on Samsung's official site anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ssfeng

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, lackluster blacks
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice monitor. Great response rate, and vibrant colours, and so thin! However, it is severely lacking when it comes to displaying blacks around the edges(w.in 1-2in from the edge) of the screen. In this area it is clear that the backlight is bleeding through and blacks appear very washed out. Some might consider this a minor issue, but it bugs me enough when watching a film to draw me out of the story. For this reason I will likely replace this monitor in 1 or 2 years, rather than keeping or for 4 or 5 as I had originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use I am quite happy with the purchase. Running at full resolution gives excellent detail and color, and the brightness levels can be adjusted to all normal indoor conditions. I really like the even LED backlighting compared to LCD, and the lower power consumption is always a good thing. I previously owned a Dell Ultrasharp and this is a big improvement. The only thing I am not impressed with has been mentioned in other reviews, and that is the slight shaking of the monitor when the desk is bumped. A vibration resistant stand would be a nice improvement. I use for amateur image editing, SC2 gaming, and general use. Would recommend if you are interested.
customer_reviews.author: Oenococcus

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Full Time Computer Screen Users
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 22" Viewsonic (NX2232W) with integrated digital TV tuner. While it was kind of cool to have the tuner, I didn't use it often enough to offset the disadvantages; which I didn't realize until after changing to the Samsung LED display MONITOR, no TV tuner. The biggest differences are in the width, pixel accuity, brightness and refresh rate (2msec). There is simply no comparison. Faster, brighter, sharper; and supports a higher pixel density. The Samsung is right on 20" wide. As a web designer, the extra width and white whites is very nice. Much less heat and of course LED uses less electricity than the flourescent backlight in the Viewsonic. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: This screen really brings out the HD picture quality. We hosted the Super Bowl party this year and one lady remarked what a great picture the set had. She has another brand TV, a plasma HD set, and just kept mentioning how good the picture quality was. We are happy. You can put your face right up close to the screen and the picture remains beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Samsung PX2370 Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to set up and connect monitor to computer via either HDMI OR DVI cables. DVI cable comes with monitor...however there is no HDMI cable... Cons: Monitor settings buttons are on back of monitor and the prompt screens are poorly designed and not very user friendly...also, when viewing monitor from even a slight angle results in a significant loss of the monitors color/clarity. A lot has been said of the lack of ability to swivel the monitor on it's base...this seems over-stated to me...If you want to change the angle of the monitor all you have to do is move it left or right with your hand...no big deal here...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my second flat screen and is a much better monitor than it's predecessor. Clear crip viewing, plug and play - what more can you ask for ? I got a great price on this from amazon.com and hopefully I get years of uninterupted use you come to expect from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful monitor all around, from the screen itself to its design. OSD is a bit tricky to navigate with the buttons being behind the screen, but you do get used to it. A bit pricier than other monitors of the same size/technology, but it is the best and definitely worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great!!! I got one as a Christmas present and loved it so much that I bought another and set up dual displays. They look great together. The clarity and 1080P HD is magnificent, even regular 700MB .AVI vidieos look terrific and the price was very nice as well. Thank you Samsung and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F

customer_reviews.title: Samsung monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the Samsung 23 inch monitor. It works well and does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Orval Oneil

customer_reviews.title: Good deal to this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for one week since I received it. It works very fine as expected. As I ever knew, LED backgournd light makes the monitor color more vivid. And it is! Up to know, I'm very satisfied with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: sherrymall

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is great
customer_reviews.text: I had an old SOYO lcd monitor (17"), now i received this one, wow this is enormous. The colors are great and doesn't heat too much.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: pretty much fabulous
customer_reviews.text: totally decent response times for gaming, lovely colors, one really has to go fishing to find criticisms of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Aroogu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor
customer_reviews.text: IF your shopping for a sleek responsive colorful 1920x1080 monitor this is one of the best choices you can make. I wouldn't hesitate to order it
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

product_meta.title: Samsung PX2370 23-Inch Widescreen LCD Monitor with LED Backlight
feature_bullets: Samsung's ultra-slim LED monitors will revolutionize your personal computing environment.
Don't be afraid of the dark. Or the light. The PX2370 ensures your dark and light colors are never compromised.
Magic Eco makes saving energy easy. This feature allows you to work on your monitor at 100 %, 75 % or 50 % brightness
The MagicLux feature measures ambient light and has four settings which automatically adjust the screen to optimum brightness.
